CONTACT_FORM.title: Contact information
CONTACT_FORM.popupTitle: Why is my personal identity number required?
CONTACT_FORM.popupText1: We require your personal identity number so you can get the RUT-deduction  on your booked services.
CONTACT_FORM.popupText2: All prices displayed are after the RUT-deduction and we fix the registration to the Swedish Tax Agency for you.
CONTACT_FORM.linkText: Read more at the Swedish Tax Agency

GET_QUOTATION_CARD.title: Trouble picking? Get a quote!
GET_QUOTATION_CARD.text: Getting a quote is not a binding agreement and completely free.

ABOUT.title: About Flyttsmart
ABOUT.text1: Flyttsmart is a free digital service that collects everything related to the move and your new home in one place. By thorough controls we select the best service providers and suppliers and can therefore offer sustainable and affordable options, making your move quicker, easier, and safer.
ABOUT.text2: On this site we present our best moving and cleaning firms but if you log into <0>flyttsmart.se</0> you can also register your new address to the Swedish tax agency, sign electricity agreements, find a internet service provider, insure your new home, and lots more!
ABOUT.text3: Best of luck with the move!

PROS.text1: So that you don't have to worry
PROS.text3: So that you get the help you need
